name: Duckling Hunt (MusainGames)
description:
Grantaire has finished drinking his second bottle of absinthe when out of nowhere baby dickling sent by the king starts attacking the Musain...

Hunt those little *burp* ducklings before they revolt and come peck away at your dreams, hopes, and life,...

And remember they are nothing *burp* more than traitors...

At least I think....

Controls:

Click/Press to shoot

Press 'R'/on amo to reload
